summary: Replaces road sign textures with relatively legible, high resolution textures.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
SPARTAN VI\'s - HiRes Road Signs
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version: v3.0
Date: 12/03/2011
Category: Textures
Author: SPARTAN VI

Description
===========
High resolution road sign textures. 

Change Log
===========
Version 2:
Made signs lighter to blend in with snowy areas. 
Reduced resolution of normal map (back to 512) and removed screenshots from RAR archive, resulted in a ~3mb reduction in the download size.

Version 3:
Removed funky transparency that made a ton of tiny pixelated holes.
Added weathering to the borders of the lower signs.
Fixed issues with the normal maps.

Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move Data folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file.
4. Launch Skyrim!

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the \"roadsigns\" folder located in your Skyrim directory: Skyrim\\data\\textures\\clutter\\signage\\roadsigns

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Please report bugs to me at skyrimnexus.com or bethsoft.com forums.

Contact
=======
If you want to get a hold of me, I\'m at the bethsoft forums as SPARTAN VI.


Tools Used
==========
Photoshop CS4- http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/


Licensing/Legal
===============
Feel free to do whatever you like with this mod, but please give credit.
PLEASE feel free to include these files in a texture pack mod.
author: SPARTAN VI

files.name: HiRes Road Signs Version 3 Worn Text
